title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.6 - Petition; withdrawal or amendment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.6 - Petition; withdrawal or amendment

State Regulations

At any time before the issuance of a notice of hearing on
a petition for investigation and certification, the director of PEPR may permit
the amendment of the petition or its withdrawal in whole or in part. At any
time after the issuance of such notice of hearing, the hearing officer, upon
motion, may permit withdrawal of the petition in whole or in part, and the
hearing officer may permit amendment thereof. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
